"Aagh, What happened?" You asked yourself as you looked around and saw a giant room around you. "W-what happened, why am I so small?" You questioned as everything was so big to you, you estimated yourself to be about 8 inches atleast. However, you started hearing a foot step behind you. You turn around and see a giant, orange, two tailed Fox, looking down at where you were.

"I can't believe it actually worked." He said as you slowly backed away due to fear. "Who are you, what do you mean it worked?" You asked.

"My name's Tails, I teleported you here." He responded.

"H-How?"

"With Technology, though it may have also shrunk you, but it works for me."

"Can you grow me back?" You ask him out of fear.

"No can do. Well... unless you agree to be my ______."

You soon stop and then you realize, everything's not getting bigger, you're shrinking? "What is going on?" You questioned as footsteps came closer towards you.
